mapper.insert: insert into plan (plan_title, plan_memo, plan_reg_date, plan_end_date, username, plan_category, plan_private) values (#{planTitle}, #{planMemo}, now(), #{inputDate}, #{username}, #{planCategory}, #{planPrivate})
mapper.select: select p.plan_id, p.plan_title, p.plan_end_date, p.plan_reg_date, p.username, r.reply_count from plan p left join do d on p.plan_id = d.plan_id left join (select plan_id, count(plan_id) as reply_count from reply group by plan_id) r on p.plan_id = r.plan_id where do_id is null and plan_private = 'Y' order by plan_end_date asc
select p.* from plan p left join do d on p.plan_id = d.plan_id where do_id is null and username = #{username} order by plan_end_date asc
